name: The Survival Specialist
description:
Background:

It's a prototype to test the idea of creating a survival card game, which is about collecting various cards and fighting zombies in a struggle to survive.

Gameplay:

The screen is split into two parts: Room and Inventory.

Player moves around the room by clicking cards.

Player picks up items on the floor by dragging cards onto inventory slots or uses them by dragging to the 'Use' or 'Equip' slots.

Moving Into Starving:

One the very left of the screen, you can see an arrow with a number inside. Every time you moves from one card to another, that number inside the arrow drops. When the number reaches zero, your inventory slots will be filled with a hungry card.

In this case, you need to eat a food card to get rid of them.

Special thanks to a lot of great people who provide invaluable suggestions: Ricky, David & Alan.
